title: How to Make Quick and Easy Rice Pudding

steps.headline: Add all ingredients to a 2 to 3-quart saucepan.
Bring to a rolling boil, stirring constantly.
Cover and let stand 12 to 15 minutes.
Serve warm with sweetened whipped cream or plain cream poured over the top.

text: Add all ingredients to a 2 to 3-quart saucepan.  Mix.  Bring to a rolling boil, stirring constantly.  Cover and let stand 12 to 15 minutes.  Stir occasionally during standing time.  Serve warm with sweetened whipped cream or plain cream poured over the top.  Serves 4.
